title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling Node.js and browser apps to chat with local models via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the REST API with sync & async support for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat, and embedding interfaces so LangChain apps can run entirely local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that plugs into the Ollama API; offers ChatGPT-like interface, model management, multi-user support, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports generate, chat, pull, and embeddings with streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) client for Ollama written in Rust; offers interactive chat, model switching, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that replaces GitHub Copilot with a local Ollama model for inline code suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes and examples showing how to integrate Ollama with LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker, Kubernetes, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support, PVC, and ingress configuration.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI, or LibreChat plus GPU/runtime options.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models; supports slash commands, system prompts, and multi-model selection.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel chat; offers thread support, model switching, and usage metrics.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm package page for the official Ollama JavaScript client showing weekly downloads and API docs.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI landing for the official Python client listing version history, wheel support, and quick-start snippets.

title: ollama on Reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama users sharing model tips, benchmarks, integrations, and troubleshooting.

title: ollama-hacker-news
summary: Hacker News discussion thread covering Ollama v0.1.20 release notes and community feedback on local LLM tooling.
